title: News24.com | Coronavirus: Colleagues gutted by death of 'inspiring' HIV scientist Gita Ramjee
description: The death of Professor Gita Ramjee who dedicated her life's work to the prevention of one virus â HIV â has left colleagues and friends gutted.
content:
The death of Professor Gita Ramjee who dedicated her life's work to the prevention of one virus – HIV – has left colleagues and friends gutted.
Ramjee fell ill after returning from a trip to England in the midst of the global novel coronavirus outbreak. A so… [+5475 chars]
